msg.payload = [
     {
            query: `
            SELECT 
                fid as id,
                ST_X(ST_Transform(geom, 4326)) as lon,
                ST_Y(ST_Transform(geom, 4326)) as lat, 
                date, 
                notes, 
                photo 
            FROM birds."Survey_points"
            `,
            output: true,
        }
    
    ]
return msg;

name: Create owntracks.events table
Insert event
func:
msg.payload = [
    {
            query: `
            INSERT INTO owntracks.event (
                geom,
                battery,
                velocity,
                altitude,
                device
            ) values (
                ST_MakePoint($lon, $lat),
                $battery,
                $velocity,
                $altitude,
                $device
            )`,
            params: msg.payload,
            output: true,
    }
]
return msg;

name: Make sure at the start of the flow we have db tables created...
Get Recent Events
func:
msg.payload = [
    {
            query: `
            SELECT 
                ST_X(geom) as lon,
                ST_Y(geom) as lat,
                battery,
                velocity,
                altitude,
                device,
                -- for map point it needs a name
                device as name, 
                'OwnTracks' as layer,
                datetime
            FROM owntracks.event`,
            output: true,
    }
    
    ]
return msg;
